thread.title: New York Fed Narrows Its Search for Successor to William Dudley

author: Michael S. Derby
title: New York Fed Narrows Its Search for Successor to William Dudley

organizations.name: federal reserve bank of new york

text:
Officials at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said Friday they are getting closer to selecting a successor to replace the bank’s current president, William Dudley, who plans to retire this summer.
The bank’s search committee has winnowed down the possible candidates to around three, and a decision could be reached within weeks, according to a person familiar with the matter.
